Title: Raise the great flag of Chairman Mao who accelerated the mission and struggle in realising a new era! In commemoration of the 85th birthday of the great leader and guide Chairman Mao Zedong
Designer: Cai Xunsheng (蔡循生)33900 unit (三三九00部队)
Publisher: Henan renmin chubanshe (河南人民出版社)
Notes: The statue is drawn after the one in Mao's mausoleum, the Chairman Mao Memorial Hall, on Tian'anmen square in Beijing.
